_sText:
Sacredplace. Hostage rescue. A map by CoCoNUT. Models by Valve, Janosch, Nauz, ProgSys, nebukadnezar Textures by Valve, CoCoNUT, Raistlin "Round-temple"-prefab by Hamster

Background: A huge temple-area in greece is being prepared for tourists and visitors, but now some terrorists took some hostages and want to press money. Terrorists: Defeat the Counter-Terrorists! Counter-Terrorists: Rescue all archaeologists.

Spawnpoints: 32, packed with Pakrat. HDR. Hand-tuned nav-file.
